recommended_action: Address EARLY_BEARING_DEGRADATION: Check lubrication levels immediately.
Schedule bearing replacement within 5–10 days if symptoms persist.
Monitor rapid temperature spike and vibration trends closely.
input_trace.safety_note: Before inspecting equipment, ensure power is isolated and lock-out/tag-out procedures are followed.

output_explanation: If you suspect the bearings are leaking, address the problem immediately. If the bearings are leaking, check lubrication levels immediately. If the bearings are leaking, schedule replacement within 5–10 days if symptoms persist. If the bearings are leaking, check power and lock-out/tag-out procedures.
